Estimating Diversity Indices

Functions for estimating aspatial diversity indices

Compute Blau's Index

ds_diversity() diversity() ds_perplexity() perplexity()

Compute Diversity

ds_hhi() hhi() ds_simpson() simpson()

Compute Herfindahl-Hirshman Index

ds_inv_simpson() inv_simpson()

Compute Simpson Index

ds_reyni() reyni()

Compute Reyni Entropy

ds_shannon() shannon()

Compute Shannon Index
